import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Questions.css'; import {Form} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, } from "react-router-dom"; // const q1 = "Tell us a little about yourself"; // const q2 = "Out of all the candidates, why should we hire you?"; // const q3 = "What are your biggest weaknesses?"; // const q4 = "What are your biggest strengths?"; // const q5 = "Where do you see yourself in 5 years?"; const questionlist = [ {q1 : "Tell us a little about yourself"}, {q2 : "Out of all the candidates, why should we hire you?"}, {q3 : "What are your biggest weaknesses?"}, {q4 : "What are your biggest strengths?"}, {q5 : "Where do you see yourself in 5 years?"}, ]; function Questions(){ return(
{/*
Question 1) Tell us a little about yourself Answer here
Question 2) Out of all the candidates, why should we hire you? Answer here
Question 3) What are your biggest weaknesses? Answer here
Question 4) What are your biggest strengths? Answer here
Question 5) Where do you see yourself in 5 years? Answer here
*/}
) } export default Questions
